conversations.body_text:
No haptic reactors

T, 30. detsember 2025, 17:30 Vergo Schapel <vergoschapel123@gmail.com>
kirjutas:

> hello i got my pedals today ,and i have problem, i 1 × Newest Simsonn Plus
> X Simracing Load Cell Pedal with Haptics Reactor,but came only pedals, not
> with haptic reactors, my order number is  Order #SSN4959, please check ,you
> forgot something
>
>
Hi Vergo Schapel,  The items were shipped separately. I will check the tracking number for the motor and get back to you.
Hi Vergo Schapel,    This is information about your another package.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=YT2535200704974753
